::: {.course-overview}
# Course Overview

This course provides a very brief introduction to the `R` programming language. It is not meant to teach `R` coding, only to get you started with using `R`.

:::


::: {.course-goals}
# Course Goals

* Know what R is.
* Have R successfully installed and set up.
* Be able to run R code.

:::


::: {.course-content}
# Course Content

The course consists of these modules and units.

- [Overview of R](r-introduction/r-introduction.qmd)
- [R Install and Setup](julia-install-setup/r-install-setup.qmd)
- [Using R through Positron](r-and-positron/r-and-positron.qmd)
- [Basics of Coding in R](r-coding-basics/r-coding-basics.qmd)
- [Further Resources](r-resources/r-resources.qmd) 

:::
